flawed_nl_solution:
She gets 2 ounces of wax from a 20 ounce candle because 20 x 0.1 = <<20*0.1=2>>2
She gets 10 ounces total from these candles because 5 x 2 = <<5*2=10>>10
She gets 0.5 ounces of wax from each 5 ounce candle because 5 x 0.1 = <<5*0.1=0.5>>0.5
She gets 2.5 ounces total from these candles because 5 x 0.5 = <<5*0.5=2.5>>2.5
She gets 0.1 ounces from each 1 ounce candle because 1 x 0.1 = <<1*0.1=0.1>>0.1
She gets 2.5 ounces from these candles because 25 x 0.1 = <<25*0.1=2.5>>2.5
She gets 20 ounces total because 10 + 2.5 + 2.5 = <<10+2.5+2.5=20>>20
She can make 4 candles because 20 / 5 = <<20/5=4>>4
